name: Rage Mountain (DoughnutDev)
description:
If your not having a good day so far I would not recommend this rage inducing game about a chick whos rocket crash landed on top of the mountain hurling the chick to the bottom of the mountain. His only goal is to get to the top but on this mountain appropriately called Rage Mountain there is plenty of opportunity to fall to the bottom. 

This game was made in 2 and a half weeks using the Godot Game Engine there is only two buttons: left, and right. 

Play on Newgrounds!
